The most relevant news and updates for OLAELEC (Ola Electric) as on May 1, 2025, are related to its new product launches and market position in the Indian electric vehicle (EV) sector. Times Drive reported on May 1, 2025, about the launch of the Ola S1X electric scooter, noting it as a significant addition to the market. In May 2025, Motoroids also reported that while Ola Electric held a strong third position in the Indian EV market, its market share had declined from 49.2% in May 2024 to 20% by May 2025, indicating a shift in the competitive landscape. Times Drive

Furthermore, regarding the broader financial and strategic developments around the same period, on May 20, 2025, Autocar Professional reported that Ola Electric announced a board meeting scheduled for May 22, 2025, to consider raising funds through the issuance of Non-Convertible Debentures (NCDs) or other eligible securities.
